# Code of conduct

<img src="like.png" width="50">
** Everyone** participating must agree on the code of conduct.

<br>
<br>

_**Excerpt:** R-Ladies is dedicated to providing a harassment-free experience for everyone. We do not tolerate harassment of participants in any form._

<br>
<br>
<img src="book.png" width="50"> Read the full version here: https://rladies.org/code-of-conduct

<br> This ensures that the environment of meetups stays **safe** and **friendly**!
